title: Untitled (No. 3 - 1956)
provenance_text:
Myron S. Stout [1908-1987], Provincetown, MA [1]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1958 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited (no. 419, illustrated in catalogue, plate 124) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959. 
[2]. The painting was purchased from the 1958 International by Carnegie Institute as a gift from Leland Hazard, Pittsburgh, PA. The purchase was made through Hansa Gallery, New York, NY; payment was sent to the gallery on January 13, 1959.
